Package model

Class DataModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.DataModel

  • public class DataModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This class models all the data available to the controls and views (when client asks the server to connect, or to exchange data)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DataModel​()
      Builds an object instance of class DataModel and initialize attributes

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void connect​(java.lang.String ipAddress, int port)
      Create a socket and initialize the stream for the communication
      void disconnect​()
      Close the socket
      DatabaseData getDatabaseData​()
      Returns the reference to a DatabaseData class instance object that summarizes all the useful information in case a clustering is loaded from db
      FileData getFileData​()
      Returns the reference to a FIleData class instance object that summarizes all the useful information in case a clustering is loaded from file
      java.io.ObjectInputStream getInputStream​()
      Returns the input stream
      java.io.ObjectOutputStream getOutputStream​()
      Returns the output stream
      boolean isConnected​()
      Returns true if the client is connected to the server
      boolean isLoadDB​()
      Returns true if the client choose to load data from db, false otherwise
      void setDatabaseData​(DatabaseData databaseData)
      Set the information in case a clustering is loaded from db
      void setFileData​(FileData fileData)
      Set the information in case a clustering is loaded from file

      • connect

        public void connect​(java.lang.String ipAddress,
                    int port)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.net.UnknownHostException
        Create a socket and initialize the stream for the communication
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - ip address of the server
        port - port on which the server is listening
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown to indicate that the IP address of a host could not be determined.
